snippet: As Royal Delta glided to victory at Santa Anita Park, Hall of Famer Mike Smith became the winningest jockey in the history of the Breeders’ Cup event.
abstract: Royal Delta wins the Breeders' Cup Ladies Classic, giving jockey Mike Smith a record 16th Breeders' Cup victory.
lead_paragraph: As Royal Delta glided to victory at Santa Anita Park, Hall of Famer Mike Smith became the winningest jockey in the history of the Breeders’ Cup event.

headline.seo: Jockey Mike Smith Guides Royal Delta to Ladies Classic Win
headline.main: Smith Guides Royal Delta to Ladies’ Classic Win
headline.print_headline: Smith Guides Royal Delta to Ladies’ Classic Win
